description: These eggplant bakes are a lighter take on pizza with all the flavours we crave.
name: Eggplant Pizza Bakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the eggplant disks on baking sheets and brush on each side with oil. Bake for 20 minutes, flipping halfway through.

In a saucepan on a medium heat, fry the onion in a little oil for 3-4 minutes until soft. Add the garlic, oregano and chilli flakes, cook for another minute and pour in the chopped tomatoes. Simmer for 10 minutes or until slightly reduced.
Remove the eggplants from the oven and top each slice with a spoonful of tomato sauce. Top with torn mozzarella and basil leaves.
Return to the oven for 5 minutes or until the mozzarella is melted and bubbling and serve.
